full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` LHA'I SKYONG RGYAL PO CHEN PO'I BSANGS MCHOD DGOS 'DOD RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004B (CES LHA'I SKYONG RGYAL PO CHEN MO LA BSANGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I DGOS 'DOD RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI NANG GI MOS PAS SNA MDZAD RDO RJE SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DI LA, KHA CIG GIS SANGS RGYAS LA SKYABS SU SONG BA'I BSLAB BYA LA JIG RTEN GYI LHA MTHU BO CHE PHYAG MCHOD CHI 'OS ZHE NA, GANG 'DUL SPRUL BA'I GAR MDZAD SPYAN RAS GZIGS, BOD KYI CHOS KYI RGYAL PO SRONG BTZANG ZHES, GSUNGS PA LTAR, DA LTA DUS KYI BSTAN DANG 'GRO BA'I DPAL DU RJE BTZUN 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS KYIS GANG LA GANG 'DUL GYIS SPRUL BA'I SKU RGYAL PO CHA LUGS 'DZIN PAR BYON PA NGOS SHES GRAGS PA LA, PHYAG MCHOGS 'GAL ZHES PO NGA RANG GIS DON MI SHIS 'BEM PO YANG YIN PA'I PHYIR, 'GAL PA LTA ZHOG YON TAN BSAM GYIS MI KHYABS YANG YOD DO, ,DA RANG GIS KYANG MYONG BA THON PAR GRUB PA 'DI LA, MKHAS PA MCHOG GIS KYANG BRIS PA 'DI LA NONGS PAR GANG GYUR KYANG BZOD PAR GSOL ZHING ZHUS DAG MDZAD PA ZHU ZHU, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BAR GYUR CIG ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
